content: Determine exactly one command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a Wikipedia page with various articles and information on a range of topics, including the short-beaked echidna, historical events such as Catherine of Aragon's marriage to King Henry VIII, and recent news such as the indictment of former US President Donald Trump. There is no specific focus on interesting facts about the history of the world.

Links: ['Jump to content (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page#bodyContent)', 'Main page (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page)', 'Contents (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contents)', 'Current events (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portal:Current_events)', 'Random article (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random)']
